answers.answer: Yessss 32 weeks and so over it

I am. I'm 32 weeks today and I feel so done. The thing that reminds me that baby isn't ready is that my daughter was born at 32 weeks due to eclampsia...otherwise, yep, I'm tired, I'm huge, I am working, going to summer classes until 39 weeks... going to the doc weekly now to watch my preeclampsia...my kids are taking advantage of me...it's hot and I want to sleep and I guess I have mood swings because right now I feel so irritated...

I'm almost 31 weeks and that's how I feel. It's made worse when they keep telling me it's a great possibility that I'll have her early. I wish there was a countdown timer on my belly until she'll actually be here, that would at least help with the mental part of it for me
29 weeks, baby #2. Everything annoys me. I'm tired, in pain all the time.

I'm almost 31 weeks and although I do love being pregnant, I've been noticing things lately. Everything makes me emotional. I literally have to talk myself put of crying over the littlest things too. Also; I live in florida. So I have 2 more months of heat and agony. It's very hot!

I'm 30w3d and I'm trying to enjoy this pregnancy #4 for as long as possible. At least right now when I wake up at night it's just to go the the restroom and back to bed, when he gets here I'll be up for an hour or so several times a night and I dread that more than being pregnant

Omg yes 30 wks along nd I'm so over it I can't stand the mood swings nd the hormones nd the pain nd being constantly uncomfortable. Tho I do love feeling her move and hearing her heartbeat at Dr apts but I'd definitely rather hold her in my arms.
31 weeks almost 32 weeks and so over this whole pregnancy thing. I just want her out so we can see her face and start making amazing memories.
That's exactly how I feel. Good to know I'm not in this alone
Oh my gawwwd! I'm so done with this pregnancy ! You are not alone.... Can't sleep good have to pee all the time. Come on August I'm ready to deliver this little boy.

Christina...thank you.  This is exactly how I feel.  I HATE when people ask me how I'm feeling.  Like they expect me to say that I'm great.  Nope.   I hurt from from the waist down, I'm so tired and I can't get comfortable.  I love feeling her kick which is making it bearable bit I'm ready to hold her.

You are definitely not alone. I am 32w4d and I feel tired, sore and miserable most days. And the heartburn! Ugh. I wish it's August already so I can meet my little prince. I will miss the belly movements though.

question: Ooh I'm sick of being pregnant now. Constantly moody, everything gets on my nerves. This 3rd pregnancy is taking forever. Wanna get it over with. Weeks are going by so slow. Always tired, the other 2 kids Constantly need attention (wich is normal) but I just don't have the energy to deal with it. Have to work until 38 weeks. Pffff. Anyone else fed up of the pregnancy now?
title: 31 weeks and sick of being pregnant
